//arnab_0017
//Edit Distances Dynamic Programming 
#include<stdio.h>
int find_min(int a,int b,int c){
    if(a<=b&&a<=c)
      return a;
    else if(b<=a&&b<=c)
      return b;
    else if(c<=a&&c<=b)
      return c;
}
int main(){
    int t,m,n,i,j,at[101][101],a[101],b[101];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
      scanf("%d",&m);
      for(i=0;i<m;++i)
        scanf("%d",&a[i]);
      scanf("%d",&n);
      for(i=0;i<n;++i)
        scanf("%d",&b[i]);
      //Initialise
      for(i=0;i<101;++i){
        at[i][0]=i;
        at[0][i]=i;
      }
      //printf("Reached Here\n");
      for(i=1;i<=m;++i){
        for(j=1;j<=n;++j){
          if(a[i-1]==b[j-1]){
            at[i][j]=at[i-1][j-1];
          }
          else{
            at[i][j]=find_min(at[i-1][j-1],at[i-1][j],at[i][j-1])+1;
          }
        }
      }
      printf("%d\n",at[m][n]);
    }
    return 0;
}
